title: Quick
shortDescription: Blazing fast, password-protected static pages in seconds
longDescription:
Do you want your website to be **faster** or **more secure**? Don't settle for one or the other. Get both with **Quick**. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page). Show a landing page with `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/landing` and a `Page Template`: ```

Welcome to my site!

``` Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times. Add password protection to your secure content in a few clicks with a wildcard `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/secure/*` and `Route Password: banana` * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content` ‚Üí _Not Authorized_ * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content?quick-password=banana` ‚Üí _Authorized!_ **Combine a `Route Password` with a `Page Template` for instant, password-protected static pages.** **Enable `Origin Mode` to simulate an origin server without any DNS configuration or server setup!** Try it out for free and make your site **fast** and **secure** today. Quick Features: * Fastest page loads on the Internet. * Password protect any route on your site. * Static page on any URL for free. * Supports wildcard routes like www.yoursite.com/*. * Origin simulation with Origin Mode. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page) or [read Quick‚Äôs docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html?ref=app-page) for complete information.
author: Network Chimp

products.title: Free
products.longDescription: Unlimited pages with wildcard route matching, custom response headers, and Origin Mode with 404 templates.

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: Everything in Free + Password protected routes
products.longDescription: Everything in Free + Password protected routes with a user-friendly password page.

proposedApp.title: Quick
proposedApp.shortDescription: Build serverless, lightning fast pages on your site
proposedApp.longDescription:
**Page load time matters. If you want the best, you've come to the right place. Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times possible. Try it out for free and see for yourself.** Just choose any URL on your domain and an HTML template. Say you want a *Hello World* page at *dev.yourdomain.com/hello-world*. Just set up the Page URL and attach a template: ```

Hello World

``` You can add scripts to your page by defining your template more explicitly: ```

Hello World

``` Thats all there is to it. Try it out for free and make your pages *quick*.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

proposedApp.longDescription:
**Page load time matters. If you want the best, you've come to the right place. Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times possible. Try it out for free and see for yourself.** Just choose any URL on your domain and an HTML template. Say you want a *Hello World* page at *dev.yourdomain.com/hello-world*. Just set up the Page URL and attach a template: ```

Hello World

``` You can add scripts to your page by defining your template more explicitly: ```

Hello World

``` Thats all there is to it. Try it out for free and make your pages *quick*. Read Quick‚Äôs [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html) for complete information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

proposedApp.title: Quick
proposedApp.shortDescription: Deploy serverless, blazing fast static pages in seconds
proposedApp.longDescription:
**Page load time matters. If you want the best, you've come to the right place. Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times possible. Try it out for free and see for yourself.** Just choose any URL on your domain and an HTML template. Say you want a *Hello World* page at *dev.yoursite.com/hello-world*. Just set up the Page URL and attach a template: ```

Hello World

``` You can add scripts to your page by defining your template more explicitly: ```

Hello World

``` Thats all there is to it. Try it out for free and make your pages *quick*. Quick Features: * The quickest page loads on the Internet. * A static page on any URL for *free*. * Completely custom templates. * Subdomains work too. * Attach custom headers to send along with each page. Read Quick‚Äôs [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html) for complete information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

products.longDescription: Unlimited pages and custom templates with the Pro tier.

proposedApp.title: Quick
proposedApp.shortDescription: Deploy serverless, blazing fast static pages in seconds
proposedApp.longDescription:
**Page load time matters. If you want the best, you've come to the right place. Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times possible. Try it out for free and see for yourself.** Just choose any URL on your domain and an HTML template. Say you want a *Hello World* page at *dev.yoursite.com/hello-world*. Just set up the Page URL and attach a template: ```

Hello World

``` You can add scripts to your page by defining your template more explicitly: ```

Hello World

``` **Enable Origin Mode to simulate an origin server without any DNS configuration or server setup!** Requests made to your root domain will render a home page template. Requests to routes that don't exist will display a 404 Not Found page. Thats all there is to it. Try it out for free and make your site *quick*. Quick Features: * The quickest page loads on the Internet. * A static page on any URL for *free*. * Completely custom templates. * Subdomains work too. * Attach custom headers to send along with each page. * Origin simulation with Origin Mode. No more server setup! Read Quick‚Äôs [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html) for complete information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

welcome0.helpvalue: Need to take your site down for maintenance? Trigger maintenance mode on your website from the edge of Cloudflare's global network with Edgy. Configure the built-in page or bring your own template. You can even enable Maintenance Mode on seperate sections of your site.

welcome1.helpvalue: Read the Cheatsheet for help and get started for free!

proposedApp.title: Quick
proposedApp.shortDescription: Deploy serverless, blazing fast static pages in seconds
proposedApp.longDescription:
**Page load time matters. If you want the best, you've come to the right place. Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times possible. Try it out for free and see for yourself.** Just choose any URL on your domain and an HTML template. Say you want a *Hello World* page at *dev.yoursite.com/hello-world*. Just set up the Page URL and attach a template: ```

Hello World

``` You can add scripts to your page by defining your template more explicitly: ```

Hello World

``` **Enable Origin Mode to simulate an origin server without any DNS configuration or server setup!** Requests made to your root domain will render a home page template. Requests to routes that don't exist will display a 404 Not Found page. Thats all there is to it. Try it out for free and make your site *quick*. Quick Features: * The quickest page loads on the Internet. * A static page on any URL for *free*. * Completely custom templates. * Subdomains work too. * Attach custom headers to send along with each page. * Origin simulation with Origin Mode. No more server setup! Read Quick‚Äôs [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html) for complete information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

products.title: Free

products.title: Plus
products.longDescription: Up to five pages with the Plus tier.

products.title: Pro
products.longDescription: Unlimited pages and custom templates with the Pro tier.

proposedApp.title: Quick
proposedApp.shortDescription: Deploy serverless, blazing fast static pages in seconds
proposedApp.longDescription:
**Page load time matters. If you want the best, you've come to the right place. Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times possible. Try it out for free and see for yourself.** Just choose any URL on your domain and an HTML template. Say you want a *Hello World* page at *dev.yoursite.com/hello-world*. Just set up the Page URL and attach a template: ```

Hello World

``` You can add scripts to your page by defining your template more explicitly: ```

Hello World

``` **Enable Origin Mode to simulate an origin server without any DNS configuration or server setup!** Requests made to your root domain will render a home page template. Requests to routes that don't exist will display a 404 Not Found page. Thats all there is to it. Try it out for free and make your site *quick*. Quick Features: * The quickest page loads on the Internet. * A static page on any URL for *free*. * Completely custom templates. * Subdomains work too. * Attach custom headers to send along with each page. * Origin simulation with Origin Mode. No more server setup! Read Quick‚Äôs [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html) for complete information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

proposedApp.title: Quick
proposedApp.shortDescription: Deploy serverless, blazing fast static pages in seconds
proposedApp.longDescription:
**Page load time matters. If you want the best, you've come to the right place. Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times possible. Try it out for free and see for yourself.** Just choose any URL on your domain and an HTML template. Say you want a *Hello World* page at *dev.yoursite.com/hello-world*. Just set up the Page URL and attach a template: ```

Hello World

``` You can add scripts to your page by defining your template more explicitly: ```

Hello World

``` **Enable Origin Mode to simulate an origin server without any DNS configuration or server setup!** Requests made to your root domain will render a home page template. Requests to routes that don't exist will display a 404 Not Found page. Thats all there is to it. Try it out for free and make your site *quick*. Quick Features: * The quickest page loads on the Internet. * A static page on any URL for *free*. * Completely custom templates. * Subdomains work too. * Attach custom headers to send along with each page. * Origin simulation with Origin Mode. No more server setup! Read Quick‚Äôs [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html) for complete information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

welcome1.helpvalue:
• Lightning fast static pages powered by Cloudflare
  • One-click password-protected routes secured by Cloudflare
  • Origin server simulation with Home and 404 pages

welcome2.helpvalue: Check out the demo to see Quick in action. Read the Cheatsheet to get started for free.

products.title: Free
products.longDescription: Unlimited pages with wildcard routes, custom templates, response headers, and origin mode with 404 templates.

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: Everything in Free + Password protected routes
products.longDescription: Everything in Free + Password protected routes with user-friendly password pages

versions.releaseNotes: Released Password-protected routes and password pages

proposedApp.title: Quick
proposedApp.shortDescription: Deploy serverless, blazing fast static pages in seconds
proposedApp.longDescription:
Do you want your website to be faster or more secure? Don't settle for one or the other. Get both with Quick. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html). Show a landing page with `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/landing` and a `Page Template`: ```

Welcome to my site!

``` Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times. Add password protection to your secure content in a few clicks with a wildcard `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/secure/*` and `Route Password: banana` * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content` ‚Üí _Not Authorized_ * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content?quick-password=banana` ‚Üí _Authorized!_ **Combine a `Route Password` with a `Page Template` for instant, password-protected static pages.** **Enable `Origin Mode` to simulate an origin server without any DNS configuration or server setup!** Try it out for free and make your site fast and secure today. Quick Features: * Fastest page loads on the Internet. * Password protect any route on your site. * Static page on any URL for free. * Supports wildcard routes like www.yoursite.com/*. * Origin simulation with Origin Mode. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html) or [read Quick‚Äôs docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html) for complete information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

proposedApp.title: Quick
proposedApp.shortDescription: Blazing fast, password-protected static pages in seconds
proposedApp.longDescription:
Do you want your website to be **faster** or **more secure**? Don't settle for one or the other. Get both with **Quick**. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page). Show a landing page with `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/landing` and a `Page Template`: ```

Welcome to my site!

``` Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times. Add password protection to your secure content in a few clicks with a wildcard `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/secure/*` and `Route Password: banana` * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content` ‚Üí _Not Authorized_ * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content?quick-password=banana` ‚Üí _Authorized!_ **Combine a `Route Password` with a `Page Template` for instant, password-protected static pages.** **Enable `Origin Mode` to simulate an origin server without any DNS configuration or server setup!** Try it out for free and make your site **fast** and **secure** today. Quick Features: * Fastest page loads on the Internet. * Password protect any route on your site. * Static page on any URL for free. * Supports wildcard routes like www.yoursite.com/*. * Origin simulation with Origin Mode. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page) or [read Quick‚Äôs docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html?ref=app-page) for complete information.

proposedApp.title: Quick
proposedApp.shortDescription: Blazing fast, password-protected static pages in seconds
proposedApp.longDescription:
Do you want your website to be **faster** or **more secure**? Don't settle for one or the other. Get both with **Quick**. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page). Show a landing page with `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/landing` and a `Page Template`: ```

Welcome to my site!

``` Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times. Add password protection to your secure content in a few clicks with a wildcard `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/secure/*` and `Route Password: banana` * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content` ‚Üí _Not Authorized_ * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content?quick-password=banana` ‚Üí _Authorized!_ **Combine a `Route Password` with a `Page Template` for instant, password-protected static pages.** **Enable `Origin Mode` to simulate an origin server without any DNS configuration or server setup!** Try it out for free and make your site **fast** and **secure** today. Quick Features: * Fastest page loads on the Internet. * Password protect any route on your site. * Static page on any URL for free. * Supports wildcard routes like www.yoursite.com/*. * Origin simulation with Origin Mode. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page) or [read Quick‚Äôs docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html?ref=app-page) for complete information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

gettingStarted0.helpvalue: ‚ö° A Quick Route is defined in the Route Configuration section. Simply add a Route URL to get started. Quick renders a Page Template if found and otherwise returns a response from the origin.

gettingStarted10.helpvalue: üîí Upgrade to the Pro plan to enable password protected pages and routes.

gettingStarted11.helpvalue: üîì Set a Route Password to enable password protection. Unauthorized requests will display a 401 Unauthorized page. Enable Password Page to make authentication easy.

gettingStarted110.helpvalue: üìñ Read the docs for more information.

gettingStarted12.helpvalue:
üìå A request containing a quick-password query parameter or request header will attempt authentication on the route:
  • www.example.com/protected?quick-password=my-password

gettingStarted18.helpvalue: üåê Enable Origin Mode to simulate an origin server on your domain. Requests made to www.example.com will render a home page and requests to nonexistant pages will render a 404 page.

gettingStarted2.helpvalue: • Any images and other media in your Templates should be hosted remotely.

gettingStarted20.helpvalue: • Origin Mode will disable any other Cloudflare Workers that are running on your origin.

gettingStarted3.helpvalue: üìå Quick renders a Page Template or Page Location if found and otherwise returns a response from the origin.

gettingStarted35.helpvalue: üìå Response Headers will be sent to the client on each request.

gettingStarted50.helpvalue: üìå A valid Route URL must include a hostname and may contain wildcards.

gettingStarted60.helpvalue:
• www.example.com/posts ‚Üí subdomains and subpaths are ok!
  • www.example.com/posts* ‚Üí wildcard for posts including /posts
  • www.example.com/posts/* ‚Üí wildcard for posts excluding /posts
  • *example.com* ‚Üí wildcard for all routes on example.com

gettingStarted9.helpvalue: üìå Pages can be reordered in the UI below but will not change the behavior of Quick.

proposedApp.shortDescription: Blazing fast, password-protected static pages in seconds
proposedApp.longDescription:
Do you want your website to be **faster** or **more secure**? Don't settle for one or the other. Get both with **Quick**. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page). Show a landing page with `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/landing` and a `Page Template`: ```

Welcome to my site!

``` Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times. Add password protection to your secure content in a few clicks with a wildcard `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/secure/*` and `Route Password: banana` * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content` ‚Üí _Not Authorized_ * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content?quick-password=banana` ‚Üí _Authorized!_ **Combine a `Route Password` with a `Page Template` for instant, password-protected static pages.** **Enable `Origin Mode` to simulate an origin server without any DNS configuration or server setup!** Try it out for free and make your site **fast** and **secure** today. Quick Features: * Fastest page loads on the Internet. * Password protect any route on your site. * Static page on any URL for free. * Supports wildcard routes like www.yoursite.com/*. * Origin simulation with Origin Mode. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page) or [read Quick‚Äôs docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html?ref=app-page) for complete information.

proposedApp.title: Quick
proposedApp.shortDescription: Blazing fast, password-protected static pages in seconds
proposedApp.longDescription:
Do you want your website to be **faster** or **more secure**? Don't settle for one or the other. Get both with **Quick**. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page). Show a landing page with `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/landing` and a `Page Template`: ```

Welcome to my site!

``` Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times. Add password protection to your secure content in a few clicks with a wildcard `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/secure/*` and `Route Password: banana` * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content` ‚Üí _Not Authorized_ * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content?quick-password=banana` ‚Üí _Authorized!_ **Combine a `Route Password` with a `Page Template` for instant, password-protected static pages.** **Enable `Origin Mode` to simulate an origin server without any DNS configuration or server setup!** Try it out for free and make your site **fast** and **secure** today. Quick Features: * Fastest page loads on the Internet. * Password protect any route on your site. * Static page on any URL for free. * Supports wildcard routes like www.yoursite.com/*. * Origin simulation with Origin Mode. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page) or [read Quick‚Äôs docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html?ref=app-page) for complete information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

proposedApp.title: Quick
proposedApp.shortDescription: Blazing fast, password-protected static pages in seconds
proposedApp.longDescription:
Do you want your website to be **faster** or **more secure**? Don't settle for one or the other. Get both with **Quick**. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page). Show a landing page with `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/landing` and a `Page Template`: ```

Welcome to my site!

``` Quick serves its pages from the edge of Cloudflare's global network to give you the fastest load times. Add password protection to your secure content in a few clicks with a wildcard `Route URL: www.yoursite.com/secure/*` and `Route Password: banana` * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content` ‚Üí _Not Authorized_ * `www.yoursite.com/secure/content?quick-password=banana` ‚Üí _Authorized!_ **Combine a `Route Password` with a `Page Template` for instant, password-protected static pages.** **Enable `Origin Mode` to simulate an origin server without any DNS configuration or server setup!** Try it out for free and make your site **fast** and **secure** today. Quick Features: * Fastest page loads on the Internet. * Password protect any route on your site. * Static page on any URL for free. * Supports wildcard routes like www.yoursite.com/*. * Origin simulation with Origin Mode. [Check out Quick in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/quick.html?ref=app-page) or [read Quick‚Äôs docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/quick.html?ref=app-page) for complete information.
